name: Rainbow 9 Online Trivia | Rainbow Mixture | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is Chicago's hockey team known as?
Heliotrope (the flower) is primarily what color?
questions.explanation:
Moderate to reddish purple.

	Helitrope (the mineral) is golden yellow.

questions.text: What color is standard, ordinary Kryptonite as feared by Superman?
What is the background color of the Royal Stewart Plaid?
What two colors is a magpie?
What color armband distinguishes the speed skater starting in the outer lane?
What color are the flowers of the Yucca plant?
Robert Louis Stevenson wrote this book based on Robin Hood.
